metadata.title: Better Tomorrow - Your Mindful Mood Companion
metadata.description: Track your mood, uncover patterns, and build a happier you. A beautiful mood journaling app with AI insights, breathing exercises, and complete privacy.

hero.headline: Finally understand why you feel the way you do
hero.subtitle: Track your moods. Uncover patterns. Build emotional resilience. All in a beautiful, private space that is yours alone.

problem.title: Some days feel heavier than others
problem.subtitle: You are not sure why. That is exactly why we built this.
problem.description: Understanding your emotions is the first step toward lighter days. Better Tomorrow gives you the clarity you have been looking for.

features.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to understand yourself better

moodTracking.title: Beautiful Mood Tracking
moodTracking.description: Capture how you feel with our intuitive 10-level scale. From struggling to amazing, every emotion has a place here.
moodTracking.detail: Add notes, photos, voice memos, and context tags to enrich every entry

patterns.title: Discover Your Patterns
patterns.description: See which activities boost your mood, who you feel best around, and when your best days happen.
patterns.detail: Beautiful visualizations reveal the story behind your emotions

breathing.title: Instant Calm When You Need It
breathing.description: 12 guided breathing exercises with synchronized animations to help you find peace in any moment.
breathing.detail: From beginner to advanced, find the perfect exercise for your mood

streaks.title: Celebrate Your Progress
streaks.description: Earn beautiful trophies as you build your mindfulness habit. Every day of self-reflection matters.
streaks.detail: From First Spark to Year Legend, your dedication is recognized

insights.sectionSubtitle: Personalized weekly insights powered by AI
insights.description: Get a comprehensive analysis of your emotional week. Discover patterns, understand your mood drivers, and receive actionable tips tailored to your journey.
insights.tone: Choose your insight tone: Friendly, Casual, Professional, or Playful

privacy.sectionSubtitle: Your moods and notes stay on your device and are never shared

feature1.title: 100% Local Storage
feature1.description: All your data lives on your device. No cloud, no servers, no exceptions.

feature2.title: No Data Mining
feature2.description: We do not read, analyze, or monetize your entries. Ever.

feature3.title: Secure and Protected
feature3.description: PIN protection, Face ID, and encrypted storage keep your journal private.

about.description: Better Tomorrow was built with a simple belief: when you understand your emotions, you gain the power to shape them.
about.signature: Made with love from Puerto Rico
about.experience: 9+ years crafting apps that help people be more positive, mindful, and productive
about.mission: Because everyone deserves a tool that truly understands them.

cta.title: Your journey to understanding yourself starts today
cta.subtitle: Takes 30 seconds. No signup required.

footer.tagline: There is always a Better Tomorrow
footer.copyright: Better Tomorrow App. All rights reserved.
